children.html:
In a recent interview with BBC at the BAFTA Awards, Shinya Takahashi (General Manager of EPD at Nintendo) alluded to the possibility of a new console.

Takahashi stated that Nintendo are always trying to surprise fans and are currently researching new hardware. This may not seem like much big news as Nintendo are always thinking about the next big thing, but as they’ve stated that they wish for the Switch to have a longer lifespan than the average console, this raises a few questions.

Are Nintendo working on a new iteration of the Switch? Or are they working on an entirely new console? Let us know what you think in the comments down below.

 

Be sure to like us on Facebook for more Nintendo goodness and why not check out what Level-5 have in store for the Switch?
